problem.markdown: >>Which of the following are true about steady state?<< Choose the TWO that are true. [x] input minus output equals zero [ ] an open system always exists [x] equilibrium exists [ ] the system must be closed [ ] feedbacks are a dominant factor [explanation] In a steady state, the inputs of a system equal the outputs, and therefore the system is in equilibrium. Steady state can occur in both open and closed systems. [explanation]
